channel.title: Others on Blog of Random things
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Blog of Random things

item.title: [抄作业] MASA的味噌拌炒豬肉茄子
item.description: 看了MASA的味噌拌炒豬肉茄子定食，今天照着做了一个： 没买红椒，所以就略过了，少了一个颜色，但是加了红葱头。加了豆腐干，上周剩的，不要浪费。 几个可以提高的地方： 我的料比较多，所以汁调少了，整个菜看着有点干 加了老抽，颜色有点深，可以不放 买的切好的肉，有点厚，不是很入味 总体还是挺好吃的！MASA的菜谱还是很推荐的。

item.title: Meat Day Today!
item.description: It may sound strange but I always found eating out by myself very weird. It maybe due to the fact that I couldn’t order many dishes. Maybe it is just the loneness when seating down by myself. Maybe it is because I don’t have a lot of things to watch on my phone. I have always prefer to cook myself at home or do takeaways. I even rarely do delivery until early this year during my two weeks' quarantine in Hongkong.
